item.title: Frank Sampedro
item.description: Frank 'Poncho' Sampedro is an American guitarist and member of the rock band Crazy Horse, known mainly for his longtime collaboration with singer-songwriter Neil Young. Sampedro has played and recorded with Young in many other configurations aside from Crazy Horse and earned co-writing credits on several Young songs. Out of all Young's musical collaborators, Sampedro has proven perhaps the most adept at working with the mercurial artist. 'Most people turn a corner. Neil ricochets,' says Sampedro.
